column2: "Wondue! Mba etuatsewfo
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse: hɔn a wɔgye apam a ommfi mo hɔ
column4: na wɔdze ebuado bua do
column6: ama wɔdze bɔn aaka bɔn ho:"

column2: "hɔn a wotsia anamɔn kɔ Egypt
column3: na wommbisa mo hɔ apam
column4: dɛ wɔdze hɔnho rokɔtwer Farao n’ahoɔdzen
column5: na wɔdze hɔn werɛ kɛhyɛ Egypt nwinwin mu!"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Farao ahoɔdzen bɛhyɛ hom fɛr
column3: na Egypt nwinwin mu awerɛhyɛmu ayɛ hom enyimguase."

column2: "Na kaansa ne mbapɔmba wɔ Zoan
column3: na n’ahembɔfo edu Hanes mpo a
column6: ɔman a worinnya mfaso bi mmfi hɔnho no ho. Wɔrennyɛ hɔn mboa anaa mfaso biara

column2: "Pomu afamu mbowa ho atsɛmbusɛm. Wɔnam ɔfona na ahoguan asaase no do
column3: mbrɛ ogyataber na ogyatanyin
column4: ehurutsia na ɔwɔ a otu fir ba no
column5: na wɔdzedze hɔn ahonya gugu nsoasopɔnkɔ abatsir
column6: na wɔdze hɔn akoradze atoto efumpɔnkɔ ekyir efu no do
column7: dze rekɛma ɔman a wɔrennyɛ hɔn mfaso no."

column2: "Egypt mboa dze
column3: mboa gyan a
column4: onnsi hwee: dɛm ntsi na mafrɛ no Rahab a ɔtse hɔ dzinn no."

column2: "Afei kɔ
column3: kyerɛw no wɔ pon do wɔ hɔn enyim
column4: na krukye no wɔ nwoma mu
column5: ama ɔaako hɔ ekesi mber a ɔreba afebɔɔ."

column2: "Na wɔyɛ ɔman etuatsewfo
column3: mba atorfo
column4: mba a wɔmmpɛ dɛ wotsie EWURADZE mbra no:"

column2: "hɔn a wɔse adzehufo dɛ
column3: Mma hom nnhu adze; na wɔse nkɔnhyɛfo dɛ
column4: Mma hom nnhyɛ dza ɔtsen ho nkɔm nkyerɛ hɛn

column2: "hom mfi ɔtsempɔn no mu
column3: hom nyi ɔkwan no akwa
column4: mma hom nnka Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no ho asɛm nnkyerɛ hɛn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no se nye yi
column3: Osiandɛ hom bu asɛm yi enyimtsia
column4: na hom twer ahyɛdo nye akɔnkyew
column5: na hom dze homho wowaw no no ntsi;"

column2: "emumuyɛ yi bɛyɛ hom dɛ mpaapaae a ɔwɔ ɔfasu a ɔkrɔn na ɔreyɛ ahwe ase
column3: na oepuhuw mu ma no bu ba awerɛfir mu na amonmu."

column2: "Na obobubu no dɛ mbrɛ sɛ wɔbobɔ ɔwemfo sɛn a wɔbobɔ no posoposo na bi nnka; amma wonnya n’esinesin mu efɛr a wɔdze suo mbukyia mu ogya
column3: anaa wɔdze saw bura mu nsu mpo."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn
column3: Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no
column4: see nye yi
column5: Ɔsan ba na ahomgye mu na wɔbɛgye hom nkwa; kommyɛ na awerɛhyɛmu mu na hom ahoɔdzen befir: naaso hom ammpɛ."

column2: "Mbom hom see dɛ
column3: Oho
column4: na yɛbɛtsena mpɔnkɔ do eguan; ntsi eguan ara na hom boguan: na
column5: Yɛbɛtsena mbowa ahoɔharfo do akɔ; dɛm ntsi hɔn a wotsiw hom no ho bɛyɛ har."

column2: "Apem boguan ɔbaakofo mpuw ano; beenu mpuw ano na hom boguan: ma ekodu dɛ hom bɛka dɛ bepɔw etsifi asɛnkyerɛdze
column3: na frankaa a osi koko do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE rotweɔn
column3: ama ɔaayɛ adom ama hom
column4: dɛm ntsi na ɔbɛma no ho do
column5: dze eehu hom mbɔbɔr: na EWURADZE yɛ atsɛmbu Nyankopɔn; esiarfo nye hɔn a wɔtweɔn no nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔman no bɛtsena Zion wɔ Jerusalɛm: ɔwo innkosu ara bio; ɔnam wo nkekamu ndze no do ɔbɔdom wo ara ampa; sɛ ɔtse a
column3: ɔbɛgye wo do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɛma hom amandzehu edziban na ahohiahia nsu dze
column3: naaso w’akyerɛkyerɛfo remmfa hɔn ho nnhuntsa bio
column4: na w’enyiwa bohu w’akyerɛkyerɛfo:"

column2: "na w’asowa bɛtse w’ekyir asɛm
column3: dɛ
column4: Ɔkwan no nye yi
column5: hom nnantsew mu; sɛ hom dze fa hom nsa nyimfa
column6: na sɛ hom dze fa hom abankum a."

column2: "Na hom bogu hom dwetɛ kyerɛw ehonyi nduraho
column3: ɔnye hom sika ehonyi a woegu nkataho no ho fi: hom bɔtow hɔn egu dɛ adze a no ho nntsew; hom bɛse no dɛ
column4: Fi ha fir."

column2: "Na ɔbɔtɔ nsu egu w’aba a edze bodua famu no do; na ɔama asaase ndɔbaa edziban
column3: na ɔayɛ sɔɔsɔɔ bafuu: da no mu na w’anyɛmbowa bedzidzi edzidzibea a ɔtserɛw do."

column2: "Anantwi no so ɔnye asoasopɔnkɔ mba a wɔyɛ asaase mu edwuma no
column3: wɔbɔwe efuw pa a wɔdze sofi ɔnye apaawa apo do."

column2: "Na bepɔw sorɔnsorɔm biara do
column3: na koko a ɔkrɔn biara do
column4: nna nsutsen na esu a ɔworawora bɛpem
column5: wɔ oku kɛse da no mu a abantsentsen bɔhwehwe ase no."

column2: "Nkyii so bosoom ne kan bɛyɛ dɛ ewia ne kan
column3: na ewia ne kan ayɛ mbɔho esuon
column4: dɛ ndaesuon ne kan
column5: wɔ da a EWURADZE bɛkyekyer ne man ne pira
column6: na ɔasa hɔn mbaa ano kur no."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: EWURADZE ne dzin fir ekyirekyir reba
column4: n’ebufuw redzɛw
column5: na orupun wusiw kumbɔɔ: n’anomu ahyɛ n’ebufuhyew ma
column6: na ne tɛkyerɛma tse dɛ ogya a ɔhyew adze:"

column2: "na n’ahom tse dɛ esu a oeyir ka kɔn mpo
column3: dɛ ɔdze egyangyandze sɔnee bɔsɔn amanaman do: na ndabraka a ɔma akwamfom ato aman hɔn adadaw mu."

column2: "Hom benya ndwom dɛ anadwe a wodzi afahyɛ krɔnkrɔn; na akoma mu enyigye
column3: dɛ obi a ɔnam atɛntɛbɛn ano rokɔ EWURADZE bepɔw do
column4: wɔ Israel Botan no nkyɛn."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɛma wɔatse n’enyimnyam ndze no
column3: na ɔakyerɛ ne nsa ne sian
column4: nye n’ebufuw ne hyeehyew
column5: na ogya a ɔhyew adze ne gyaframee

column2: "Na ɔnam EWURADZE ne ndze do na Asirianyi no ho bɔpopo na ɔbɛtse n’abaa ne yaw."
"Na hyɛber poma biara a EWURADZE dze besi no do no
column3: wɔbɛka no mpintsin na asanku: na ɔdze nsa a ɔwosow na ɔnye hɔn bɔko."

column2: "Na wofir tsetseetse na woesiesie ogyahyewbea ato hɔ; nyew
column3: wɔayɛ no krado ama ɔhen no; ɔayɛ no dɔnkuronn tɛtɛɛtɛr: ne ntanaa yɛ ogya na ngyantsia pii; EWURADZE n’ahom ma ɔdzɛw dɛ ogya sɔɔfee a ɔrepem."
